description.zh-cn: 明朝第十二位皇帝，年号嘉靖。在位前期锐意改革，史称“嘉靖中兴”，但后期崇信道教、荒怠朝政，导致严嵩专权、吏治腐败。
description.en: The 12th emperor of the Ming Dynasty, with the era name Jiajing. In his early reign, he was dedicated to reforms, a period known as the 'Jiajing Restoration'. However, in his later years, he became obsessed with Taoism, neglected state affairs, leading to the dominance of Yan Song and widespread corruption.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第十一位皇帝，明世宗的堂兄。驾崩后无嗣，导致旁支的明世宗得以继位。
description.en: The 11th emperor of the Ming Dynasty and cousin of Emperor Shizong. He died without an heir, which led to the succession of Emperor Shizong from a collateral branch.

description.zh-cn: 明朝内阁首辅，拥立明世宗继位，但在“大礼议”事件中与明世宗发生严重冲突并最终致仕。
description.en: Grand Secretary of the Ming Dynasty who supported Emperor Shizong's ascension to the throne, but had a major conflict with him during the 'Great Rites Controversy' and was eventually forced to retire.

description.zh-cn: 明世宗的生父，被追尊为“睿宗献皇帝”。
description.en: The biological father of Emperor Shizong, posthumously honored as 'Emperor Ruizong Xian'.

description.zh-cn: 明世宗的生母，被追尊为皇太后。
description.en: The biological mother of Emperor Shizong, posthumously honored as Empress Dowager.

description.zh-cn: 嘉靖初年，明世宗为追尊其生父为皇帝而与杨廷和等朝臣发生的政治冲突，最终以明世宗的胜利告终，期间廷杖致死多名大臣。
description.en: A political conflict in the early Jiajing era between Emperor Shizong and court officials led by Yang Tinghe over posthumously honoring his biological father as emperor. It ended with the emperor's victory and resulted in the death of several ministers by caning.

description.zh-cn: 明朝内阁首辅，在明世宗怠政期间专权二十年，以贪赃枉法、残害忠良而闻名。
description.en: Grand Secretary of the Ming Dynasty who held power for two decades during Emperor Shizong's neglect of state affairs, known for his corruption, abuse of power, and persecution of loyal officials.

description.zh-cn: 嘉靖二十一年，由于明世宗暴虐，数名宫女试图将其缢杀的事件。明世宗虽幸免于难，但事后移居西苑，长期不上朝。
description.en: An event in the 21st year of the Jiajing era where several palace maids attempted to strangle the abusive Emperor Shizong. Although he survived, he moved to the West Park and ceased holding court for a long period.

description.zh-cn: 中国本土宗教，明世宗笃信道教，追求长生不老，为此大兴土木、修设斋醮，耗费巨大。
description.en: An indigenous Chinese religion. Emperor Shizong was a devout follower, pursuing immortality, which led to large-scale construction projects and frequent rituals, resulting in enormous expenditure.

description.zh-cn: 指明世宗在位前期，革除前朝弊政，励精图治，使国家呈现中兴气象的时期。
description.en: Refers to the period in the early reign of Emperor Shizong, characterized by his efforts to eliminate the malpractices of the previous reign and govern diligently, leading to a period of revival.

description.zh-cn: 发生于明朝嘉靖三十四年，是中国乃至世界历史上死亡人数最多的地震，对明朝国力造成严重影响。
description.en: Occurred in the 34th year of the Jiajing era of the Ming Dynasty, it was the deadliest earthquake in Chinese and world history, severely impacting the state power of the Ming Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明朝官员，以刚直不阿著称，曾上《治安疏》直谏明世宗，险些被处死。
description.en: A Ming Dynasty official known for his integrity and uprightness. He submitted the 'Memorial on Public Order' to directly admonish Emperor Shizong, nearly leading to his execution.

description.zh-cn: 户部主事海瑞于嘉靖四十五年向明世宗呈上的奏疏，因直言批评皇帝的过失而震惊朝野。
description.en: A memorial submitted to Emperor Shizong by Hai Rui, a secretary of the Ministry of Revenue, in the 45th year of the Jiajing era. It shocked the court with its direct criticism of the emperor's faults.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第十三位皇帝，明世宗第三子，继承其皇位。
description.en: The 13th emperor of the Ming Dynasty, the third son of Emperor Shizong, and his successor to the throne.

description.zh-cn: 明武宗时期宠臣，明世宗即位后被处以寸斩。
description.en: A favorite official during Emperor Wuzong's reign, he was executed by slow slicing after Emperor Shizong ascended the throne.

description.zh-cn: 明武宗时期宠臣，明世宗即位后被处死。
description.en: A favorite official during Emperor Wuzong's reign, he was executed after Emperor Shizong ascended the throne.

description.zh-cn: 杨廷和之子，因在大礼议中反对明世宗，被廷杖并流放。
description.en: Son of Yang Tinghe, he opposed Emperor Shizong in the Great Rites Controversy, and was subsequently caned at court and exiled.

description.zh-cn: 明朝太医，在壬寅宫变后用“虎狼之药”救活了明世宗。
description.en: An imperial physician of the Ming Dynasty who revived Emperor Shizong with potent medicine after the Renyin Palace Incident.

description.zh-cn: 明世宗妃嫔，壬寅宫变发生后被处决。
description.en: A consort of Emperor Shizong who was executed after the Renyin Palace Incident occurred.

description.zh-cn: 明朝官员，因弹劾严嵩而惨遭杀害。
description.en: A Ming Dynasty official who was brutally murdered for impeaching Yan Song.

description.zh-cn: 明朝官员，因弹劾严嵩而惨遭杀害。
description.en: A Ming Dynasty official who was brutally murdered for impeaching Yan Song.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第十位皇帝，明武宗之父，明世宗的伯父。在大礼议中，朝臣要求明世宗认其为父。
description.en: The 10th emperor of the Ming Dynasty, father of Emperor Wuzong and uncle of Emperor Shizong. During the Great Rites Controversy, court officials demanded that Emperor Shizong recognize him as his adoptive father.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代思想家、教育家，儒家学派创始人。嘉靖九年，明世宗将其尊号由“大成至圣文宣王”改为“至圣先师”。
description.en: An ancient Chinese philosopher, educator, and founder of Confucianism. In the 9th year of Jiajing (1530), Emperor Shizong changed his honorific title from 'Greatly Accomplished, Ultimate Sage, King of Culture' to 'Ultimate Sage, First Teacher'.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个朝代（1368年－1644年），由朱元璋建立。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history (1368–1644), established by Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 明武宗驾崩且无子嗣，导致其堂弟朱厚熜（明世宗）作为旁支宗室得以入继大统。
description.en: The death of Emperor Wuzong without an heir led to his cousin Zhu Houcong (Emperor Shizong) succeeding to the throne as a member of a collateral branch of the imperial family.

description.zh-cn: 明武宗驾崩后，时任内阁首辅的杨廷和与皇太后议定，拥立朱厚熜入京继皇帝位。
description.en: After Emperor Wuzong's death, Grand Secretary Yang Tinghe, in consultation with the Empress Dowager, arranged for Zhu Houcong to be brought to Beijing to succeed to the throne.

description.zh-cn: 在“大礼议”事件中，明世宗因追尊生父问题与杨廷和等朝臣爆发严重冲突，最终迫使杨廷和退休。
description.en: During the 'Great Rites Controversy', Emperor Shizong had a severe conflict with Yang Tinghe and other court officials over the posthumous honoring of his biological father, eventually forcing Yang Tinghe to retire.

description.zh-cn: 明世宗坚持要追封其生父兴献王为“皇帝”，此举引发了长达三年半的“大礼议”之争。
description.en: Emperor Shizong's insistence on posthumously honoring his biological father, the Prince of Xing, as 'Emperor' triggered the three-and-a-half-year 'Great Rites Controversy'.

description.zh-cn: 因在大礼议中反对皇帝，杨慎等人被处以廷杖并被流放。
description.en: For opposing the emperor during the Great Rites Controversy, Yang Shen and others were caned at court and exiled.

description.zh-cn: 明世宗在位前期推行改革，革除先朝蠹政，锐意图治，开创了“嘉靖中兴”的局面。
description.en: In the early part of his reign, Emperor Shizong implemented reforms, eliminated the corrupt practices of the previous reign, and governed diligently, ushering in the 'Jiajing Restoration'.

description.zh-cn: 明世宗笃信道教，为追求长生不老之术，每年不断修设斋醮，迷信方士，造成巨大靡费。
description.en: Emperor Shizong was a devout follower of Taoism. In his pursuit of immortality, he continuously held religious ceremonies and trusted alchemists, resulting in enormous state expenditure.

description.zh-cn: 在壬寅宫变中，明世宗险些被数名宫女缢杀，事后移居西苑，长期不上朝。
description.en: During the Renyin Palace Incident, Emperor Shizong was nearly strangled to death by several palace maids. Afterwards, he moved to the West Park and ceased holding court for a long period.

description.zh-cn: 壬寅宫变发生后，曹端妃被处决。
description.en: After the Renyin Palace Incident, Consort Cao Duan was executed.

description.zh-cn: 在壬寅宫变后，太医许绅用药救活了明世宗。
description.en: After the Renyin Palace Incident, the imperial physician Xu Shen revived Emperor Shizong with medicine.

description.zh-cn: 明世宗在位中后期开始荒政，深居西苑不上朝，将政令皆交由严嵩打理，导致严嵩父子专权、贪赃枉法。
description.en: In the middle and late stages of his reign, Emperor Shizong neglected his duties, residing in the West Park and not attending court, entrusting state affairs to Yan Song, which led to the dominance and corruption of Yan Song and his son.

description.zh-cn: 严嵩专权期间，残害忠良，杨继盛等朝臣惨遭杀害。
description.en: During his time in power, Yan Song persecuted loyal officials, and court officials like Yang Jisheng were brutally murdered.

description.zh-cn: 严嵩专权期间，残害忠良，沈炼等朝臣惨遭杀害。
description.en: During his time in power, Yan Song persecuted loyal officials, and court officials like Shen Lian were brutally murdered.

description.zh-cn: 嘉靖大地震造成巨大人员伤亡和财产损失，导致明朝国库连续两年亏空，对明朝的国力和财政状况造成严重影响。
description.en: The Jiajing Great Earthquake caused massive casualties and property damage, leading to two consecutive years of deficits in the Ming treasury and severely impacting the dynasty's national strength and financial situation.

description.zh-cn: 海瑞上呈的《治安疏》直言批评明世宗的过失，使其大怒，并下令将海瑞论罪。
description.en: The 'Memorial on Public Order' submitted by Hai Rui directly criticized Emperor Shizong's faults, enraging him and leading him to order Hai Rui's punishment.

description.zh-cn: 明世宗即位后，革除先朝蠹政，将前朝奸臣钱宁处以寸斩。
description.en: After ascending the throne, Emperor Shizong eliminated the corrupt practices of the previous reign and executed the treacherous official Qian Ning by slow slicing.

description.zh-cn: 明世宗即位后，革除先朝蠹政，将前朝奸臣江彬处死。
description.en: After ascending the throne, Emperor Shizong eliminated the corrupt practices of the previous reign and executed the treacherous official Jiang Bin.

description.zh-cn: 明世宗是明孝宗的侄子。
description.en: Emperor Shizong was the nephew of Emperor Xiaozong.

description.zh-cn: 嘉靖九年，明世宗将孔子的尊号由“大成至圣文宣王”改为“至圣先师”。
description.en: In the 9th year of the Jiajing era (1530), Emperor Shizong changed the honorific title of Confucius from 'Greatly Accomplished, Ultimate Sage, King of Culture' to 'Ultimate Sage, First Teacher'.
